org.apache.gearpump.transport.netty

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.gearpump.transport.netty.Client
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    akka.actor.Actor

    public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
implements akka.actor.Actor
    Netty Client implemented as an actor, on the other side, there is a netty server Actor. All messages sent to this actor will be forwarded to remote machine.
